analysis.description:

	-approve (/unique_chucks/6/0xed023b117953fcfaa92150d3ebe3e987d19563ce.sol#155)

HeroToken.migrateHero uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(now < 1520694000 && tx.origin == 0x47169f78750Be1e6ec2DEb2974458ac4F8751714) (/unique_chucks/6/0xed023b117953fcfaa92150d3ebe3e987d19563ce.sol#594-597)

Reentrancy in ERC721DutchAuction._createAuction (/unique_chucks/6/0xed023b117953fcfaa92150d3ebe3e987d19563ce.sol#756-799):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(nonFungibleContract.ownerOf(_tokenId) == msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/6/0xed023b117953fcfaa92150d3ebe3e987d19563ce.sol#776-777)
	- nonFungibleContract.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_tokenId) (/unique_chucks/6/0xed023b117953fcfaa92150d3ebe3e987d19563ce.sol#788-790)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenIdToAuction (/unique_chucks/6/0xed023b117953fcfaa92150d3ebe3e987d19563ce.sol#798-799)
